m_szDocTitle: Toyota Mirai becomes first hydrogen-fuelled electric car eligible for the plug-in car grant
m_szDocSumamry: Toyota Mirai becomes first hydrogen-fuelled electric car eligible for the plug-in car grant Was this article useful? 1 person found this useful The new Toyota Mirai hydrogen fuel cell saloon is eligible for the plug-in car grant in recognition of its zero emissions performance. The Office for Low Emission Vehicles (OLEV) has added Mirai to the list of cars and vans that qualify for a £5,000 reduction on the car’s purchase price.
